dialogue.text: It's my first time touching the grass. It always looked so soft through the glass, but yet… it's so prickly
What am I supposed to do now? Wander around? Find shelter?
(stomach growling)
I guess that answers my question…
OH! (Cashmere Jumps out of nowhere)

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: Hi there!
Uhh…Hi…
(He looks so happy.)

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: You look lost, do you need help?
Oh.. Um.. To be honest.. Yeah...

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: Okay! Come with me! I'll help you! By the way, my name is Cashmere. What’s your name?
My name is ${name}.

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: Nice to meet you ${name}!
Cashmere brings you to meet the rest of the group.

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: So here is my group!

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: This is Darius.
(He looks stressed out.)

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: This is Margiela.
What's with this guy?

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: This is Volfgangus Armadeus Raven Meowzart.
He doesn't look like he wants to be here.

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: And last but not least, this is Calpico.
Pick a character to learn more about them!

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: Hey, how are you? Have you gotten around to meeting everyone yet? Some may look mean, but don’t worry, when they get to know you, they’ll warm up to you!

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: Surviving on these streets may be hard at first. My advice is to be nice to everyone and don’t be afraid to ask for help! You got this!

dialogue.speaker: Margiela
dialogue.text: Hey there. What was your name again? ${name}? Not as cool as my name, but it’s alright I guess.

dialogue.speaker: Margiela
dialogue.text: To survive in the streets you need to trust yourself and only yourself. How do you think i haven’t gotten any scars on my pretty fur?

dialogue.speaker: Margiela
dialogue.text: I’m just hanging out with these guys because Cashmere begged me to.

dialogue.speaker: Margiela
dialogue.text: I mean, I understand him, wanting someone as cool as me in the group is the best addition he could hope for.

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: Hiya! Name’s Darius! FOR NOXUS haha, get it?

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: My friends think I’m lucky for being able to survive this long, but really - I just do what they do.

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: They’re cool, I love them! Sometimes they treat me differently, and I don’t know why - all I know is that they’re there for me when it matters!

dialogue.speaker: Volfgangus Armadeus Raven Meowzart
dialogue.text: *He looks at you and scoffs.*

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: Hi, my name’s Calpico. Need the time? Need to know where to find food?

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: If ever you have any questions, come to me.

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: Ask me anything, I know the answer. These other guys do the same thing when they need help.
A human approaches your group. They offer you food. What do you do?

choices.text: Wait for the human to leave and then eat

dialogue.speaker: Cashmere
dialogue.text: *Cashmere eats with you, enjoying the warmth of the moment*
*Margiela commends your boldness, saying you should dominate, not beg.*

dialogue.speaker: Calpico
dialogue.text: *Calpico respects your cautious, calculated approach.*

dialogue.speaker: Darius
dialogue.text: *Darius follows, saying you can't trust humans.*

dialogue.speaker: Gangus
dialogue.text: *Gangus, watching from the shadows, mutters that it's dangerous to rely on humans at all.*
